main_definition: Lanka is a term not commonly recognized as an idiom in English, but it may refer to the ancient kingdom of Lanka (Sri Lanka) or its association with mythology and legends.

meanings_and_examples.example: The epic Ramayana describes Ayodhya's prince Rama traveling to the ancient kingdom of Lanka (Sri Lanka) on a quest.
In Hindu mythology, Ravana was the king of the mythical land of Lanka before his battle against Rama.
